title: [K-12] Generative AI-Enhanced Creativity Education for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers: Problem-Posing Learning Reinforcement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics understanding, problem-solving experience, and basic AI tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environments using digital devices, with problem-solving activities based on interaction with generative AI (ChatGPT)

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three mathematics problems with fluency, flexibility, and originality by analyzing data tables, images, and open-ended scenarios.
Learners can improve existing problems or present at least two case studies of new problem variations through interactive dialogue with AI.
Learners can write self-assessment reports reflecting strategic thinking and educational applicability in the problem-creation process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
